00290 
00291     template <typename T> 
00292     inline _xvec3<T> _xvec3<T>::operator* (const _xmat3<T>& m) const
00293     {
00294         return _xvec3<T>(
00295             m[0][0] * this->x + m[0][1] * this->y + m[0][2] * this->z,
00296             m[1][0] * this->x + m[1][1] * this->y + m[1][2] * this->z,
00297             m[2][0] * this->x + m[2][1] * this->y + m[2][2] * this->z);
00298     }
00299 
00300     template <typename T> 
00301     inline _xvec3<T>& _xvec3<T>::operator*= (const _xmat3<T>& m)
00302     {
00303         return *this = *this * m;
00304     }

00498     inline _bvec3 _bvec3::operator--()
00499     {
00500             this->x = !x;

00502         this->z = !z;
00503             return *this;
